properties.children: Currently, you are not eligible for funding

properties.htmlString: Please contact our team on 0330 178 8021 or email sales@liberis.co.uk who will be happy to discuss your application.

properties.children: Someone will be in touch shortly.

properties.heading: h2
properties.children: Unfortunately, you are declined for funding

properties.htmlString: Please contact our team on 0330 178 8021 or email sales@liberis.co.uk who will be happy to discuss your application.

properties.text:
*As of April 2021, 86% of successful applications received funding within 2 working days. Any preliminary approval will be based on the information about your business that is available at the time. You will get a final decision after submitting an actual application.

**You will be expected to operate your business in a way that ensures Liberis receives a monthly minimum amount.

***Your credit score is not affected by applying for a BCA. Taking out a BCA may affect your credit score.

This product is provided by Liberis Ltd, Scale Space Building, 1st Floor, 58 Wood Lane London, W12 7RZ (company number: 05654231). Liberis' Business Cash Advance is a form of receivables finance not a loan. Liberis is not authorised or regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Financial Ombudsman Service will not be able to consider a complaint about Liberis. Amounts advanced are subject to status and our underwriting process before any offer can be made.

text.children:
Our funding is designed for small 
businesses like yours.

dataSchema.title: To get a quote, start by entering your company reference

verificationData.title: Enter the following characters from your Barclaycard settlement account number to authenticate your identity:

toolTip.tip: Your Barclaycard Client ID (CID) is the first 8 digits of your Invoice Number, found in the top right-hand corner of your Barclaycard merchant statement. You can find your Client ID on your paper statement, or on your digital statement found on Barclays Online Banking.

errorMessage.required: Your Client ID must be 8 digits long.
errorMessage.pattern: Your Client ID must be 8 digits long

toolTip.tip: Please enter the settlement account number for your Barclays business bank account.

errorMessage.required: This information is required to continue.

toolTips.text: Where to find your Client ID?
toolTips.tip: Your Barclaycard Client ID (CID) is the first 8 digits of your Invoice Number, found in the top right-hand corner of your Barclaycard merchant statement. You can find your Client ID on your paper statement, or on your digital statement found on Barclays Online Banking.

heading.children:
Simple. Stress-Free. 
 Like Business Finance Should Be.
heading.heading: h2

list.heading: Quick and hassle-free
list.paragraph: Funds could be in your account in as little as 2 working days of successful application.*

list.heading: Daily card payment %
list.paragraph: Pay us when customers pay you**, through an agreed % of your daily card revenue.

properties.title: Payments flex in line with card revenue

heading.children: Fund your business in just 3 steps
heading.heading: h2

list.heading: Apply online by confirming your details
list.paragraph:
Our online application only takes a few minutes to complete. Once
you confirm your details, you'll get a decision on the spot.

list.heading: Choose your quote
list.paragraph:
You'll know if you're approved right away, with no impact to your
credit score.*** Simply select the quote that works best for you.

list.heading: Set-up your account
list.paragraph: Finally, finish setting up your account and your funds could be on their way in as little as 2 working days of successful application. Enjoy!

properties.title: What our customers say
properties.quoteText: The funding has been a great enabler, allowing us to fast forward our growth. Without it, we’d be a year behind where we are now.

properties.firstInputDescription: Why we are asking for this: All majority shareholders of the business are required to apply for funding.
properties.secondInputDescription: Why we are asking for this: All majority shareholders of the business are required to apply for funding.

properties.modalLabel: Consent to share infomation with Liberis

properties.children: I authorise Barclays Bank plc to share the following information about me with Liberis Limited:

iconHeadingTextOptions.text: Name
Trading Name
Address
Settlement Bank Account
Description of Business
Ownership of Business
Contact Details (email address and telephone number)
Transaction data in respect of the card payments accepted by my business for the past 12 months (including number and value of refunds and chargebacks)

properties.children: This information will be used for the purposes of (i) entering into a credit and debit card receivables sale and purchase agreement with Liberis, [(ii) monitoring the performance of the obligations under such sale and purchase agreement, (iii) facilitating the payment of part of the card receivables by Barclaycard to Liberis in order repay any sums due from me to Liberis and (iv) collection activities by authorised agents in case of default.]

properties.htmlString: For more information about how Liberis will use your personal data, visit the privacy policy.

properties.children: Thanks, you've given us all the information needed to give you your decision and quote.

properties.toa: By continuing with this application, you understand that we will share the information you submit with credit reference and fraud prevention agencies for the purposes of carrying out credit checks and fraud related searches on the business(es) and individual(s) referenced in this application. For more information on how your data will be used and shared, please see Liberis' Privacy Policy.

text: One moment while we generate your decision.
One more moment while we generate your quote!

properties.modalLabel: Consent to share infomation with Liberis

properties.children: I authorise Barclays Bank plc to share the following information about me with Liberis Limited:

iconHeadingTextOptions.text: Name
Trading Name
Address
Settlement Bank Account
Description of Business
Ownership of Business
Contact Details (email address and telephone number)
Transaction data in respect of the card payments accepted by my business for the past 12 months (including number and value of refunds and chargebacks)

properties.children: This information will be used for the purposes of (i) entering into a credit and debit card receivables sale and purchase agreement with Liberis, [(ii) monitoring the performance of the obligations under such sale and purchase agreement, (iii) facilitating the payment of part of the card receivables by Barclaycard to Liberis in order repay any sums due from me to Liberis and (iv) collection activities by authorised agents in case of default.]

properties.htmlString: For more information about how Liberis will use your personal data, visit the privacy policy.

text.children:
Our funding is designed for small 
businesses like yours.

dataSchema.title: To get a quote, start by entering your company reference

verificationData.title: Enter the following characters from your Barclaycard settlement account number to authenticate your identity:

toolTip.tip: Your Barclaycard Client ID (CID) is the first 8 digits of your Invoice Number, found in the top right-hand corner of your Barclaycard merchant statement. You can find your Client ID on your paper statement, or on your digital statement found on Barclays Online Banking.

errorMessage.required: Your Client ID must be 8 digits long.
errorMessage.pattern: Your Client ID must be 8 digits long

toolTip.tip: Please enter the settlement account number for your Barclays business bank account.

errorMessage.required: This information is required to continue.

toolTips.text: Where to find your Client ID?
toolTips.tip: Your Barclaycard Client ID (CID) is the first 8 digits of your Invoice Number, found in the top right-hand corner of your Barclaycard merchant statement. You can find your Client ID on your paper statement, or on your digital statement found on Barclays Online Banking.

heading.children:
Simple. Stress-Free. 
 Like Business Finance Should Be.
heading.heading: h2

list.heading: Quick and hassle-free
list.paragraph: Funds could be in your account in as little as 2 working days of successful application.*

list.heading: Daily card payment %
list.paragraph: Pay us when customers pay you**, through an agreed % of your daily card revenue.

properties.title: Payments flex in line with card revenue

heading.children: Fund your business in just 3 steps
heading.heading: h2

list.heading: Apply online by confirming your details
list.paragraph:
Our online application only takes a few minutes to complete. Once
you confirm your details, you'll get a decision on the spot.

list.heading: Choose your quote
list.paragraph:
You'll know if you're approved right away, with no impact to your
credit score.*** Simply select the quote that works best for you.

list.heading: Set-up your account
list.paragraph: Finally, finish setting up your account and your funds could be on their way in as little as 2 working days of successful application. Enjoy!

properties.title: What our customers say
properties.quoteText: The funding has been a great enabler, allowing us to fast forward our growth. Without it, we’d be a year behind where we are now.

dataSchema.title: To get a quote, start by entering your company reference

toolTips.text: Where to find your Client ID?
toolTips.tip: Your Barclaycard Client ID (CID) is the first 8 digits of your Invoice Number, found in the top right-hand corner of your Barclaycard merchant statement. You can find your Client ID on your paper statement, or on your digital statement found on Barclays Online Banking.

properties.text:
*As of April 2021, 86% of successful applications received funding within 2 working days. Any preliminary approval will be based on the information about your business that is available at the time. You will get a final decision after submitting an actual application.

**You will be expected to operate your business in a way that ensures Liberis receives a monthly minimum amount.

***Your credit score is not affected by applying for a BCA. Taking out a BCA may affect your credit score.

This product is provided by Liberis Ltd, Scale Space Building, 1st Floor, 58 Wood Lane London, W12 7RZ (company number: 05654231). Liberis' Business Cash Advance is a form of receivables finance not a loan. Liberis is not authorised or regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Financial Ombudsman Service will not be able to consider a complaint about Liberis. Amounts advanced are subject to status and our underwriting process before any offer can be made.

texts.loading: One moment while we generate your quote.
texts.dailyCardPaymentToolTip: When a customer uses their card to buy something at your business, a percentage of that sale automatically goes toward paying for your advance.
texts.fixedToolTip: This is the total amount that you will pay for your advance.
texts.estimatedToolTip: Your estimated time is how long we estimate it will take you to pay for your advance, based off of your current average card volumes.
texts.minMonth: Minimum monthly amount is 3% of the fixed cost.
texts.title: Your confirmed quote
texts.headingAutoApproved:
Congratulations! 
 You're approved for up to {{maxAmount}}!
texts.headingReferred: Thanks for providing your details, here are your generated quotes
texts.paragraphAutoApproved:
Confirm your quote, and you could receive your funds in as little as 2 working days of successful application*.
*As of January 2022, 82% of successful applications received funding within 2 working days.
texts.paragraphReferred: Once you select your preferred quote, we will review your application and be in touch within 1 working day.
texts.quoteListSubHeading: Depending on what you need, you could choose:
texts.toa:
Here is the quote that you've selected. If you are happy with it, you can go ahead and submit your application. Once submitted, funds could be in your account in as little as 48 hours.

Before you continue, please confirm that you have read and understood the following:

I understand that Liberis will apply an e-split to my existing Barclaycard card terminal, so that when a customer makes a payment, a fixed percentage of that payment will go directly to Liberis to pay for my Business Cash Advance. I understand that this may, on occasion, slightly delay my card takings to appear in my account.

For more information about how Liberis will use your personal data, visit the Privacy Policy.

purchaseAmount.tooltip: This is the total amount that you will pay for your advance.

term.title: Estimated time
term.tooltip: Your estimated time is how long we estimate it will take you to pay for your advance, based off of your current average card volumes.

dataSchema.title: Thank you for submitting your application

properties.children: Now it's time to set-up your account. By setting up your account, you'll be able to receive your funds in as little as 48 hours*.
*As of January 2022, 82% of successful applications received funding within 2 working days.

iconHeadingTextOptions.heading: Funding Questions
iconHeadingTextOptions.text: The first part of the set-up will require you to answer a few questions about your business and how you plan to use your funds.

iconHeadingTextOptions.heading: Bank Information
iconHeadingTextOptions.text: Please provide your bank information so that we can set-up automatic payments.

dataSchema.title: Thanks for applying, we're reviewing your application

iconHeadingTextOptions.heading: Application review
iconHeadingTextOptions.text: We will review your application and will be in touch within 1 working day to your registered phone number or email address to let you know if you're approved for funding.

iconHeadingTextOptions.heading: Receive your contract
iconHeadingTextOptions.text: If approved, we will send your contract to your registered email address within 2 working days of the approved decision.

iconHeadingTextOptions.heading: Receive funds
iconHeadingTextOptions.text: After you sign the contract, we'll send funds directly to your bank account. This typically happens within 2 working days after receiving the signed contract.

properties.htmlString:
Need help?
If you have any questions while we review your application, please do not hesitate to contact us on 0330 178 8021.

dataSchema.title: See my quote
dataSchema.description: Fill out the form below and we’ll be in touch to discuss your quoting options if you are eligible!

errorMessage.required: Please enter a valid email address
errorMessage.format: Please enter a valid email address

errorMessage.required: Please enter a valid phone number
errorMessage.pattern: Please enter a valid phone number
Please enter a valid average monthly card volumes

properties.children: If you've been in business for 4 months or more, and take an average of £1,500+ in card takings per month, a member of our sales team will be in touch shortly.

properties.heading: h2
properties.children: Unfortunately, we couldn't quote you online

properties.htmlString: Don't worry - we have your contact details and someone will be in touch to discuss your application.

properties.text:
*As of April 2021, 86% of successful applications received funding within 2 working days. Any preliminary approval will be based on the information about your business that is available at the time. You will get a final decision after submitting an actual application.
**You will be expected to operate your business in a way that ensures Liberis receives a monthly minimum amount of 3% of the total amount owed to Liberis.
***Your credit score is unaffected when obtaining a quote. However, taking out a Liberis Cash Advance may affect your credit score, and any decision to take out a Liberis Cash Advance shall be solely at your own risk.
This product is provided by Liberis Limited, a company registered in England and Wales with company number: 05654231 and address at: Space Building, 1st Floor, Scale, 58 Wood Ln, London W12 7RZ. Liberis is a responsible financial provider. Liberis’ Business Cash Advance is a form of receivables finance. Liberis does not provide regulated lending products of any type. The minimum expected duration of a Business Cash Advance is 120 days. Liberis is not authorised or regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Financial Ombudsman Service will not be able to consider a complaint about Liberis. Amounts advanced are subject to status and our underwriting process before any offer can be made.
The Elavon in partnership with Liberis Revenue-based Finance product is provided by Liberis Ltd. Eligibility criteria and terms and conditions apply. The Elavon in partnership with Liberis Revenue-based Finance product is not a Financial Conduct Authority regulated product, it is provided by Liberis Ltd and Elavon will receive a commission.
